properties.NAME: Bayside Marketplace
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Bayside Marketplace is a two-story open air shopping center located in the downtown Miami, Florida.

properties.NAME: Miami Heat Arena
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The American Airlines Arena is a sports and entertainment arena located in Downtown Miami, Florida along Biscayne Bay. It was constructed beginning in 1998 as a replacement for the Miami Arena and designed by the architecture firms Arquitectonica and 360 Architecture.

properties.NAME: Miami Seaquarium
properties.DESCRIPTIO: The Miami Seaquarium is a 38-acre oceanarium located on the island of Virginia Key in Biscayne Bay, Miami-Dade County, Florida, United States and is located near downtown Miami. Founded in 1955, it is one of the oldest oceanariums in the United States.

properties.NAME: Gulfstream Park Racing and Casino
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Gulfstream Park is a racetrack and county-approved casino in Hallandale Beach, Florida. During its annual meet, which spans December through October, it is one of the most important venues for horse racing in the USA.

properties.NAME: Xtreme Action Park
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Complex with a half-mile asphalt go-kart track, bowling lanes, an indoor ropes course, mutiple restaurants, & a bar.

properties.NAME: TIDAL COVE WATERPARK
properties.ADDRESS: Don Soffer Exercise Trail, 19999 W Country Club Dr, Aventura, FL 33180
properties.DESCRIPTIO: Daring drops, turns, and twisting spirals await when you make a splash at Tidal Cove! Conquer a gravity-defying raft ride, thrill to a freefall loop, meander along a lazy river, and make a new friend in the Kids Cove. Whether you’re relaxing beneath one of 25 breezy cabanas, enjoying a bite to eat, or experiencing the ride of your life, you’re sure to find it at Tidal Cove.
